long_description: With soft, quick-drying stretch fabric, excellent sun protection and thumbhole cuffs that hold sleeves in place, the REI Venturi Quarter-Zip top is ideal for cool-weather workouts and trail hikes. Knit polyester/spandex blend wicks sweat and offers 4-way stretch to enhance your comfort as you make your way down the trail; fabric also has good snag resistance. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Thumbholes keep sleeves in place during activity or while layering under gloves or coats; mock neck provides extra coverage but a deep front zipper promotes ventilation. Low-profile, welded bicep zip pocket carries small essentials while you're on the go. The REI Venturi Quarter-Zip has a comfortable, easy fit.
short_description: With soft, quick-drying stretch fabric, excellent sun protection and thumbhole cuffs that hold sleeves in place, the REI Venturi Quarter-Zip top is ideal for cool-weather workouts and trail hikes.
